alert.note: Alert for Iberia; Lafayette; St. Martin; St. Mary; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 01 at 2:55AM CST until December 01 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Iberia Parish in south central Louisiana... Southeastern Lafayette Parish in south central Louisiana... North central St. Mary Parish in south central Louisiana... East central Vermilion Parish in southwestern Louisiana... Central St. Martin Parish in south central Louisiana... * Until 400 AM CST. * At 255 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Jefferson Island, or 8 miles east of Abbeville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... New Iberia, St. Martinville, Jeanerette, Avery Island, Broussard, Youngsville, Erath, Delcambre, Loreauville, Cade, Lydia, Acadiana Regional Airport, Jefferson Island, Sorrel, Coteau, Lake Fausse Pointe, and Charenton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Iberia; Lafayette; St. Martin; St. Mary; Vermilion
